body_html: I've tried a few different speculations and don't believe either worked: updating the gRPC commit point and commenting out the unneeded absl dependence. Still investigating. Can you suggest a good test to consider as a signal for what's working or not? I've been trying with bazel test //tensorflow/contrib/all_reduce:all but I don't know how representative of a test that is.

body: I've tried a few different speculations and don't believe either worked: updating the gRPC commit point and commenting out the unneeded absl dependence. Still investigating. Can you suggest a good test to consider as a signal for what's working or not? I've been trying with `bazel test //tensorflow/contrib/all_reduce:all` but I don't know how representative of a test that is.
